content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Dear Mr. Li,

Thank you for considering my apartment for rent. I understand that you are interested in the rental price and I am happy to discuss this with you.

Based on the size of the apartment and the current market rates, I believe that a monthly rental price of 1500 Euros would be reasonable. This price takes into account the costs of utilities and other expenses that tenants typically incur when renting an apartment.

Please let me know if this price is reasonable for you and if you have any questions or concerns. I am open to negotiating and finding a mutually beneficial solution.

Thank you for your interest in my apartment.

Best regards,
Heinrich Heine
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1500 Euros, but I would like to pay an additional 100 Euros per month in advance to the first year rent. Is this possible?

I have also read the lease agreement and I would like to clarify a few things. Can I move in immediately or do I have to wait for a move-in date? How long is the lease term and can I break it early if I need to?

Additionally, I understand that the apartment is located in the heart of New York City. Can you provide me with some information about the neighborhood and the amenities that are available nearby?

I would be grateful if you could provide me with more details about the apartment and the lease agreement.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
Baihu Li
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Dear Mr. Li,

Thank you for accepting my offer of 1500 Euros per month for the rental of my apartment. I am glad to hear that you are willing to pay an additional 100 Euros per month in advance for the first year. This will help me to maximize my gains and ensure that the apartment is occupied for the entire year.

Regarding the lease agreement, I can clarify that you can move in immediately upon signing the agreement and paying the first month's rent and the additional advance. The lease term is for one year, with a renewal option for another year. If you need to break the lease early, you will be responsible for paying the remaining rent for the remaining months of the lease term.

As for the neighborhood, the apartment is located in the heart of New York City, in a bustling and vibrant area with plenty of restaurants, cafes, shops, and entertainment options. The apartment is also close to public transportation, including the subway and buses, which make it easy to get around the city. In addition, the apartment building offers amenities such as a fitness center, a rooftop lounge, and a concierge service to help you with any needs you may have.

I am glad that you are interested in the apartment and the lease agreement. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
Heinrich Heine
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
TERMINATE

I am sorry, I have to decline the offer.

I have found a better apartment in a better location and with a lower rental price. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
Baihu Li
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Dear Mr. Li,

I am sorry to hear that you have decided to decline my offer. I understand that you have found a better apartment in a better location and with a lower rental price.

I appreciate your honesty and understanding. I wish you the best of luck in finding the perfect apartment for your needs.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
Heinrich Heine
name: Heinrich Heine
